title: long_qdec_table
description: Tool to operate on longitudinal QDEC tables.

qdec_table.title: QDEC Table
qdec_table.description: QDEC table file specifying the subjects and time points

split.title: Split Column
split.description: Split table based on column (e.g., use 'fsid-base' to separate subjects)

cross_flag.title: Cross Table Flag
cross_flag.description: Collapse table to cross sectional (one line per subject)

sort.title: Sort Column
sort.description: Sort table based on column within subject (e.g., 'age')

out.title: Output File Name
out.description: Output file name for operations producing a single table
